AttachInstances.title: AttachInstances
AttachInstances.summary: You can call the AttachInstances operation to add existing Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances to a cluster.

AttachInstancesToNodePool.title: AttachInstancesToNodePool
AttachInstancesToNodePool.summary: You can call the AttachInstancesToNodePool operation to add existing nodes to a node pool.

CancelClusterUpgrade.title: CancelClusterUpgrade
CancelClusterUpgrade.summary: You can call the CancelClusterUpgrade operation to cancel the update of a cluster.

CancelComponentUpgrade.title: CancelComponentUpgrade
CancelComponentUpgrade.summary: You can call the CancelComponentUpgrade operation to cancel the update of a component.

CancelTask.title: CancelTask
CancelTask.summary: You can call the CancelTask operation to cancel a task.

CancelWorkflow.title: CancelWorkflow
CancelWorkflow.summary: You can call the CancelWorkflow operation to cancel an ongoing workflow.

CheckControlPlaneLogEnable.title: CheckControlPlaneLogEnable
CheckControlPlaneLogEnable.summary: You can call the CheckControlPlaneLogEnable operation to modify the log collection configurations of control plane components in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) managed cluster.

CreateAutoscalingConfig.title: CreateAutoscalingConfig
CreateAutoscalingConfig.summary: You can call the CreateAutoscalingConfig operation to configure auto scaling.

CreateCluster.title: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.summary: You can call the CreateCluster operation to create a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster. ACK clusters include ACK managed clusters, ACK dedicated clusters, ACK Serverless clusters, ACK Edge clusters, ACK clusters that support sandboxed containers, and registered clusters. For more information about how to create different types of ACK clusters, see the following usage notes.

CreateClusterNodePool.title: CreateClusterNodePool
CreateClusterNodePool.summary: You can call the CreateClusterNodePool operation to create a node pool for a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

CreateKubernetesTrigger.title: CreateKubernetesTrigger
CreateKubernetesTrigger.summary: You can call the CreateKubernetesTrigger operation to create a trigger for an application.

CreateTemplate.title: CreateTemplate
CreateTemplate.summary: You can call the CreateTemplate operation to create an orchestration template.

CreateTrigger.title: CreateTrigger
CreateTrigger.summary: You can call the CreateTrigger operation to create a trigger for an application.

DeleteCluster.title: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.summary: You can call the DeleteCluster operation to delete a cluster by cluster ID and release all nodes in the cluster.

DeleteClusterNodepool.title: DeleteClusterNodepool
DeleteClusterNodepool.summary: You can call the DeleteClusterNodepool operation to delete a node pool by node pool ID.

DeleteClusterNodes.title: DeleteClusterNodes
DeleteClusterNodes.summary: You can call the DeleteClusterNodes operation to remove nodes from a cluster by node name.

DeleteKubernetesTrigger.title: DeleteKubernetesTrigger
DeleteKubernetesTrigger.summary: You can call the DeleteKubernetesTrigger operation to delete an application trigger by trigger ID

DeletePolicyInstance.title: DeletePolicyInstance
DeletePolicyInstance.summary: You can call the DeletePolicyInstance operation to delete policy instances from a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DeleteTemplate.title: DeleteTemplate
DeleteTemplate.summary: You can call the DeleteTemplate operation to delete an orchestration template by template ID.

DeleteTrigger.title: DeleteTrigger
DeleteTrigger.summary: You can call the DeleteTrigger operation to delete an application trigger.

DeployPolicyInstance.title: DeployPolicyInstance
DeployPolicyInstance.summary: You can call the DeployPolicyInstance operation to deploy a policy instance in a cluster.

DescirbeWorkflow.title: DescirbeWorkflow
DescirbeWorkflow.summary: You can call the DescirbeWorkflow operation to query detailed information about a workflow.

DescribeAddons.title: DescribeAddons
DescribeAddons.summary: You can call the DescribeAddons operation to query the details about all components that are supported by Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).

DescribeClusterAddonInstance.title: DescribeClusterAddonInstance
DescribeClusterAddonInstance.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAddonInstance operation to query the information about a cluster component, including the version, status, and configuration of the component.

DescribeClusterAddonMetadata.title: DescribeClusterAddonMetadata
DescribeClusterAddonMetadata.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAddonMetadata operation to query the metadata of a component version. The metadata includes the component version and available parameters.

DescribeClusterAddonUpgradeStatus.title: DescribeClusterAddonUpgradeStatus
DescribeClusterAddonUpgradeStatus.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAddonUpgradeStatus operation to query the update progress of a cluster component.

DescribeClusterAddonsUpgradeStatus.title: DescribeClusterAddonsUpgradeStatus
DescribeClusterAddonsUpgradeStatus.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAddonsUpgradeStatus operation to query the update progress of a component by component name.

DescribeClusterAddonsVersion.title: DescribeClusterAddonsVersion
DescribeClusterAddonsVersion.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAddonsVersion operation to query the details about all components in a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterAttachScripts.title: DescribeClusterAttachScripts
DescribeClusterAttachScripts.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterAttachScripts operation to query the script that is used to add instances to a cluster.

DescribeClusterDetail.title: DescribeClusterDetail
DescribeClusterDetail.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterDetail operation to query the details of a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterEvents.title: DescribeClusterEvents
DescribeClusterEvents.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterEvents operation to query the events of a cluster.

DescribeClusterLogs.title: DescribeClusterLogs
DescribeClusterLogs.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterLogs operation to query the log of a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterNodePoolDetail.title: DescribeClusterNodePoolDetail
DescribeClusterNodePoolDetail.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterNodePoolDetail.html operation to query the details about a node pool in a cluster by node pool ID.

DescribeClusterNodePools.title: DescribeClusterNodePools
DescribeClusterNodePools.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterNodePools operation to query node pools in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DescribeClusterNodes.title: DescribeClusterNodes
DescribeClusterNodes.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterNodes operation to query the details about all nodes in a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterResources.title: DescribeClusterResources
DescribeClusterResources.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterResources operation to query all resources in a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterTasks.title: DescribeClusterTasks
DescribeClusterTasks.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterTasks operation to the tasks of a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterUserKubeconfig.title: DescribeClusterUserKubeconfig
DescribeClusterUserKubeconfig.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterUserKubeconfig operation to query the kubeconfig file of a cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeClusterVuls.title: DescribeClusterVuls
DescribeClusterVuls.summary: You can call the DescribeClusterVuls operation to query the vulnerability information of a cluster.

DescribeClusters.title: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.summary: You can call the DescribeClusters operation to query all the clusters that belong to the current Alibaba Cloud account, including Kubernetes clusters and Swarm clusters.

DescribeClustersV1.title: DescribeClustersV1
DescribeClustersV1.summary: You can call the DescribeClustersV1 operation to query the details about all Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

DescribeEvents.title: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.summary: You can call the DescribeEvents operation to query operation events.

DescribeExternalAgent.title: DescribeExternalAgent
DescribeExternalAgent.summary: You can call the DescribeExternalAgent operation to query the agent configurations of a registered cluster by cluster ID.

DescribeKubernetesVersionMetadata.title: DescribeKubernetesVersionMetadata
DescribeKubernetesVersionMetadata.summary: You can call the DescribeKubernetesVersionMetadata operation to query the Kubernetes versions supported by Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).

DescribeNodePoolVuls.title: DescribeNodePoolVuls
DescribeNodePoolVuls.summary: You can call the DescribeNodePoolVuls operation to query node pool vulnerabilities in a cluster.

DescribePolicies.title: DescribePolicies
DescribePolicies.summary: You can call the DescribePolicies operation to query a list of policies.

DescribePolicyDetails.title: DescribePolicyDetails
DescribePolicyDetails.summary: You can call the DescribePolicyDetails operation to query information about a policy.

DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster.title: DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster
DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster.summary: You can call the DescribePolicyGovernanceInCluster operation to query information about policies in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DescribePolicyInstances.title: DescribePolicyInstances
DescribePolicyInstances.summary: You can call the DescribePolicyInstances operation to query policy instances that are deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DescribePolicyInstancesStatus.title: DescribePolicyInstancesStatus
DescribePolicyInstancesStatus.summary: You can call the DescribePolicyInstancesStatus operation to query information about policy instances in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster. The information includes the number of instances deployed from each policy and the number of policy instances of each severity level.

DescribeSubaccountK8sClusterUserConfig.title: DescribeSubaccountK8sClusterUserConfig
DescribeSubaccountK8sClusterUserConfig.summary: You can use an Alibaba Cloud account to call the DescribeSubaccountK8sClusterUserConfig operation to obtain the cluster kubeconfig file of a RAM user or RAM role.

DescribeTaskInfo.title: DescribeTaskInfo
DescribeTaskInfo.summary: You can call the DescribeTaskInfo operation to query the execution details about a task by task ID.

DescribeTemplateAttribute.title: DescribeTemplateAttribute
DescribeTemplateAttribute.summary: You can call the DescribeTemplateAttribute operation to query the details of an orchestration template by template ID.

DescribeTemplates.title: DescribeTemplates
DescribeTemplates.summary: You can call the DescribeTemplates operation to query the details of all orchestration templates.

DescribeTrigger.title: DescribeTrigger
DescribeTrigger.summary: You can call the DescribeTrigger operation to query triggers.

DescribeUserPermission.title: DescribeUserPermission
DescribeUserPermission.summary: You can call the DescribeUserPermission operation to query the permissions that are granted to a RAM user to manage clusters.

DescribeUserQuota.title: DescribeUserQuota
DescribeUserQuota.summary: You can call the DescribeUserQuota operation to query cluster and node quotas.

DescribeWorkflows.title: DescribeWorkflows
DescribeWorkflows.summary: You can call the DescribeWorkflows operation to query all workflows.

FixNodePoolVuls.title: FixNodePoolVuls
FixNodePoolVuls.summary: You can call the FixNodePoolVuls operation to automatically patch vulnerabilities for the node pools in a cluster.

GetClusterCheck.title: GetClusterCheck
GetClusterCheck.summary: You can call the GetClusterCheck operation to query the status and cluster check results of a cluster.

GetKubernetesTrigger.title: GetKubernetesTrigger
GetKubernetesTrigger.summary: You can call the GetKubernetesTrigger operationto query the triggers of an application by application name.

GetUpgradeStatus.title: GetUpgradeStatus
GetUpgradeStatus.summary: You can call the GetUpgradeStatus operation to query the update progress of a cluster by cluster ID.

GrantPermissions.title: GrantPermissions
GrantPermissions.summary: You can call the GrantPermissions operation to grant a Resource Access Management (RAM) user the permissions to manage Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

InstallClusterAddons.title: InstallClusterAddons
InstallClusterAddons.summary: You can call the InstallClusterAddons operation to install a component.

ListClusterChecks.title: ListClusterChecks
ListClusterChecks.summary: You can call the ListClusterChecks operation to query all the cluster check results of a cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: You can call the ListTagResources operation to query the labels of resources in clusters by cluster IDs.

MigrateCluster.title: MigrateCluster
MigrateCluster.summary: You can call the MigrateCluster operation to migrate workloads from a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) Basic cluster to an ACK Pro cluster.

ModifyCluster.title: ModifyCluster
ModifyCluster.summary: You can call the ModifyCluster operation to modify the cluster configurations by cluster ID.

ModifyClusterAddon.title: ModifyClusterAddon
ModifyClusterAddon.summary: You can call the ModifyClusterAddon operation to modify the configuration of a component that is installed in a cluster. After you call this operation, the component may be redeployed and restarted. We recommend that you assess the impact before you call this operation.

ModifyClusterNodePool.title: ModifyClusterNodePool
ModifyClusterNodePool.summary: You can call the ModifyClusterNodePool operation to modify the configuration of a node pool.

ModifyClusterTags.title: ModifyClusterTags
ModifyClusterTags.summary: You can call the ModifyClusterTags operation to modify the labels of a cluster by cluster ID.

ModifyNodePoolNodeConfig.title: ModifyNodePoolNodeConfig
ModifyNodePoolNodeConfig.summary: You can call the ModifyNodePoolNodeConfig operation to modify the node configuration of a node pool.

ModifyPolicyInstance.title: ModifyPolicyInstance
ModifyPolicyInstance.summary: You can call the ModifyPolicyInstance operation to update policy instances in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

OpenAckService.title: OpenAckService
OpenAckService.summary: You can call the OpenAckService operation to activate Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).

PauseClusterUpgrade.title: PauseClusterUpgrade
PauseClusterUpgrade.summary: You can call the PauseClusterUpgrade operation to pause the update of a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

PauseComponentUpgrade.title: PauseComponentUpgrade
PauseComponentUpgrade.summary: You can call the PauseComponentUpgrade operation to pause the update of a component.

PauseTask.title: PauseTask
PauseTask.summary: You can call the PauseTask operation to pause a task.

RemoveNodePoolNodes.title: RemoveNodePoolNodes
RemoveNodePoolNodes.summary: Removes nodes from a node pool.

RemoveWorkflow.title: RemoveWorkflow
RemoveWorkflow.summary: You can call the RemoveWorkflow operation to delete a workflow.

RepairClusterNodePool.title: RepairClusterNodePool
RepairClusterNodePool.summary: You can call the RepairClusterNodePool operation to fix issues on specified nodes in a managed node pool.

ResumeComponentUpgrade.title: ResumeComponentUpgrade
ResumeComponentUpgrade.summary: You can call the ResumeComponentUpgrade operation to resume the update of a component.

ResumeTask.title: ResumeTask
ResumeTask.summary: You can call the ResumeTask operation to resume a task.

ResumeUpgradeCluster.title: ResumeUpgradeCluster
ResumeUpgradeCluster.summary: You can call the ResumeUpgradeCluster operation to resume the update of a cluster by cluster ID.

RunClusterCheck.title: RunClusterCheck
RunClusterCheck.summary: You can call the RunClusterCheck operation to initiate cluster checks, such as cluster update prechecks.

ScaleClusterNodePool.title: ScaleClusterNodePool
ScaleClusterNodePool.summary: You can call the ScaleClusterNodePool operation to scale out a node pool by node pool ID.

ScanClusterVuls.title: ScanClusterVuls
ScanClusterVuls.summary: You can call the ScanClusterVuls operation to scan vulnerabilities in a cluster.

StartWorkflow.title: StartWorkflow
StartWorkflow.summary: You can call the StartWorkflow operation to create a workflow.

StopAlert.title: StopAlert
StopAlert.summary: You can call the StopAlert operation to disable an alert rule or an alert rule set in the alert center of Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).

SyncClusterNodePool.title: SyncClusterNodePool
SyncClusterNodePool.summary: You can call the SyncClusterNodePool operation to synchronize node pool information, including metadata and node information.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: You can call the TagResources operation to add labels to a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

UnInstallClusterAddons.title: UnInstallClusterAddons
UnInstallClusterAddons.summary: You can call the UnInstallClusterAddons operation to uninstall the components in a cluster by component names.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: You can call the UntagResources operation to remove labels from Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

UpdateControlPlaneLog.title: UpdateControlPlaneLog
UpdateControlPlaneLog.summary: You can call the UpdateControlPlaneLog operation to modify the log collection configurations for control plane components in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) managed cluster.

UpdateK8sClusterUserConfigExpire.title: UpdateK8sClusterUserConfigExpire
UpdateK8sClusterUserConfigExpire.summary: You can call the UpdateK8sClusterUserConfigExpire operation to modify the validity period of the kubeconfig file of a cluster.

UpdateTemplate.title: UpdateTemplate
UpdateTemplate.summary: You can call the UpdateTemplate operation to update an orchestration template by template ID.

UpgradeCluster.title: UpgradeCluster
UpgradeCluster.summary: You can call the UpgradeCluster operation to upgrade a cluster by cluster ID.

UpgradeClusterAddons.title: UpgradeClusterAddons
UpgradeClusterAddons.summary: You can call the UpgradeClusterAddons operation to update a component to the specified version.

UpgradeClusterNodepool.title: UpgradeClusterNodepool
UpgradeClusterNodepool.summary: You can call the UpgradeClusterNodepool operation to update the Kubernetes version, OS version, or container runtime version of the nodes in a node pool.
